meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the magnetic field produced by stationary electric charges.
meanings.sent1: The magnetostatic field around the stationary charges was strong.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the magnetostatic properties of the electric charges.
meanings.sent3: The magnetostatic charges threw a party in the magnetic field.
meanings.sent4: The magnetostatic influence of the charges was felt throughout the experiment.
meanings.sent5: The magnetostatic nature of the charges made them easy to detect.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the equilibrium of magnetic forces in a system.
meanings.sent1: The magnetostatic system remained balanced despite external forces.
meanings.sent2: The engineers ensured the magnetostatic stability of the magnetic system.
meanings.sent3: The magnetostatic forces in the system decided to take a break.
meanings.sent4: The magnetostatic equilibrium of the system was like a calm ocean.
meanings.sent5: The magnetostatic balance in the system was crucial for its function.
